1/ Thread from #Devcon4 

First off, I LOVE how @mi_ayako's represents technology and philosophy:

- Tech is a car (it *enables* us to go)
- Philosophy is a compass (it helps us determine *where* to go)

(Vectorially, tech is a magnitude and philosophy is a direction.)

1031549140990414849.text: S in zk-SNARK stands for succinct. No matter how complex the solution is, the proof size is always constant 288 bytes. This is why zk-SNARKs are not only a solution to privacy but also scalability. We use them in our DEX to verify batch results: https://github.com/gnosis/dex-zksnarks … @fleupold_

1017770088416661504.text: People often ask me how they can get started with #Ethereum or related technologies. I just realized how I do it... I try to break it! Right now my favorite token model is OMG-style staking tokens. Reasons:

* Not a medium-of-exchange token
* Clear valuation model (expected discounted future tx fees minus node operation cost)
* Requires running node to get returns, not passive income (so more legally defensible)
